mapper.sql: SHOP_NAME shopName, MENU_NAME menuName, MENU_PRICE menuPrice, MENU_CONTENT menuContent , MENU_CONTENT_IMG menuContentImg, MENU_EXPLAIN menuExplain
mapper.insert: insert into menu(SHOP_NAME, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_CONTENT, MENU_CONTENT_IMG, MENU_EXPLAIN) values (#{shopName}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuContent}, #{menuContentImg}, #{menuExplain})
mapper.select: select * from menu where menu_name=#{menuName} and shop_name=#{shopName}
